column1: tkettle9719,"2011-12-28T18:00:27.997Z","Cobra Crusher is a cooler, more representative name...","

column2: I got this set at Walmart for about 10 dollars while with my grandparents as a small child, and I remember really liking it. It is more than just an average Racers set.

column3: The pull-forward motor is interesting, and works well.
The turnable wheels are a welcome addition to this great set.
The stickers are a real pain in the you-know-what.
I don't understand why this set is called the fire spinner if it has a cobra.

column2: This set is a really nice, inexpensive fist, and looks just as great or better than any Hot Wheels car ever, even if there isn't licensing. I would buy it at around a 20 dollar pricepoint.
